resources.string: C++ is a cross-platform language that can be used to create high-performance applications. C++ was developed by Bjarne Stroustrup
C# is a general-purpose high-level programming language supporting multiple paradigms.
Java is a widely-used programming language for coding web applications. It has been a popular choice among developers for over two decades, with millions of Java applications in use today
Kotlin is a modern statically typed programming language used by over 60% of professional Android developers that helps boost productivity, developer satisfaction, and code safety.
Python is a computer programming language often used to build websites and software, automate tasks, and conduct data analysis.
JavaScript is a scripting language that enables you to create dynamically updating content, control multimedia, animate images, and pretty much everything else.
Swift is a robust and intuitive programming language created by Apple for building apps for iOS, Mac, Apple TV, and Apple Watch
